name: Karen Bonera
text: "My First visit to Yulia Bentsak was above expectations. She is real professional and her work speaks for itself. I would definitely recommend their services to anyone."

name: Zack Royes
text: "This was the best salon experience I've ever had. Very comfortable, peacful atmosphere. Everyone was so friendly and welcoming. I get tons of compliments about my new look. Thank you so much, keep beeing awesome!"

name: Megan Frost
text: "i am happy to be client of Yulia Bentsak! Her understanding of style do a stellar job every time!"
